action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hi, welcome to the practice mode, I'll guide you through this."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Staying alive will be tough, but as long as you have Rings, you won't die when attacked or touch an enemy!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Don't forget to take regular breaks!"&newline&"You can press Esc to pause!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You can jump up here, by simply pressing Enter"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Well, I can't jump up here! Not even with MY speed. Try a different route..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Uh-oh! A badnik, he's easy though, just jump on him!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You can also hold Down! You'll crouch... this can make you not take any damage, no problems. (and dodge anything shooting at me!)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "This looks a little high for me to simply just run up and jump. Keep trying, you can do this!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Cool! Simply jump to the top, and I'll leave training mode."
